title: Landing Page for a Burger Shop
description:
Designed and developed a landing page for a Burger Shop who wants to display their product details on the landing page.
The client wants a minimal design with a BIG image of a burger on the top, so I displayed a big burger image on the top inside an egg-shaped vessel.
Also displayed their products under the products section and created a wonderful gallery of images under the photos section.

projectImages.title: Hero section of the landing page
Client's testimonials section with hover effect
Bold amazing footer with contact form above
